title: Executive Order 5023-Extension of Trust Period on Allotments Made to the Iowa Indians in Kansas and Nebraska
content: It is hereby ordered, under authority contained in the Act of June 21, 1906 (34 Stats. 325-326), that the period on the allotments to the Iowa Indians in Kansas and Nebraska, which trust period expires during the calendar year 1929, be, and is hereby, extended for a period of ten years, with the following exceptions:
citation: Calvin Coolidge, Executive Order 5023-Extension of Trust Period on Allotments Made to the Iowa Indians in Kansas and Nebraska Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/277280
